snippet: A poem by the German Nobel laureate Günter Grass depicting Israel's undeclared nuclear might as a threat to world peace drew wide condemnation from Jewish groups and media commentators.
abstract: A poem by the German Nobel laureate Günter Grass depicting Israel's undeclared nuclear might as a threat to world peace drew wide condemnation from Jewish groups and media commentators.

headline.main: Günter Grass Poem Attacking Israel for Threatening Iran Is Condemned in Germany
